title: Hard Knocks Recap; Live From Vegas, Part 2: NFC breakdown (Football 08/08)
description:
Will Brinson breaks down Hard Knocks, Episode 1 and hits on the latest NFL news before throwing it to the second part of his Vegas podcast episode with Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jon Campbell of OddsShark, where they jumped on the mic live from Las Vegas to break down the NFC and hand out some Super Bowl picks. Will also breaks down the latest news and notes around the NFL over the last few days of training camp.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
